Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'If Kassandra wanted to fulfill her role as Keeper, she had quite the job ahead of her. The Key to controlling the Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff would lie in simulations created by Aletheia. Kassandra just had to step inside.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium'
MemoryInfobox.next:
Welcome to Elysium
A Growing Perception
MemoryInfobox.location:
Gateway to the Lost City, Thera, Greece
Heart of Elysium, Elysium

General_Description: '''Trials of the Keeper''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra walked into the first portal created by [[Aletheia]], not knowing what awaited her within.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached the first portal. *'''Kassandra:''' ''No going back now. I have to trust her.'' Kassandra entered the portal.
Having landed in [[Elysium]], Kassandra surveyed her surroundings. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Aletheia needs to work on that landing.'' A [[Ros|dog]] approached Kassandra and began licking her face. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Eugh!'' The dog left, leading Kassandra to a squadron of frozen Isu soldiers guarding a regally-dressed Isu [[Persephone|woman]] with violet eyes. *'''Persephone:''' ''You don't belong here.'' Persephone snapped her fingers, awakening the soldiers and sending them to attack Kassandra. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Oh, shit.''
Section_Outcome: Upon entering Elysium, Kassandra was accosted by a squadron of Isu soldiers controlled by Persephone.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium]]''
